## IMGUI.setCursor() method

Sets cursor property to given `id`<!-- -->. This setting is cleared at the beginning of each frame (default value: "default").

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCursor(id: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
